casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rodney Maurice LUTZ No. 315P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Mr. Rodney Maurice Lutz, Pro se. Mr. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, For State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of August 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
